name: Cheesecake Wars
description:
This game is an old fashioned story-based console app that runs in your command prompt.

Let's just say, there's a goblin and a dragon.

This is my first ever fully running game made in C#, please don't hate, but feedback on the story is welcome. Thank you :)

To Install, Use Win-Rar to extract The Folder, locate ConsoleApp1.exe and create a shortcut for easy access.
